casebody.data:
SFR INVESTMENTS POOL 1, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company, Appellant,
v.
MORTGAGE ELECTRONIC REGISTRATION SYSTEMS, INC., "MERS" a Corporation State of Incorporation Unknown; Bank of America, N.A., a Federally Chartered Bank Registered in Delaware; and U.S. Bank N.A., as Trustee for the Holders of CSMC 2007-2, Respondents. No. 72222 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED DECEMBER 04, 2018

AFFIRMED.
